name: Apes
description: Earn Reflections From Shilling. Welcome to APES Token, where the apes finally get enough bananas! Apes is an innovative community token with significant reflections. Apes holders earn up to 8% bananas (reflections) by holding and tweeting about $APES. Apes token offers a unique and innovative use case: Shilling Reflections (called Bananas). By rewarding all apes for their token shilling with bananas, Ape Token provides a unique use-case to all online influencers on top of NFTs and Metaverse.
